Hassan Hosny (Arabic) (June 19, 1936 〜 May 30, 2020) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị. A maara ya maka El Nazer ("The headmaster") (2000), El basha telmiz (2004) na Zaky Chan (2005). A na-ewere ya dịka onye agha nke  ihe nkiri Egypt, ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya gafere ihe karịrị afọ 50 ma gụnye ihe ngosi na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri 500, mmemme telivishọn na ihe nkiri ihe mere eme. A na-akpọ ya Joker nke ihe nkiri Egypt.
A mụrụ Hassan Hosny na mpaghara citadel nke Cairo na June 19, 1936

[lower-alpha 1] A mụrụ ya nye nna ọchụnta ego, nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ isii. N'ịbụ onye a kọwara dịla onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, Hosny malitere ime ihe nkiri n"afọ ndị 1960 n'ihe nkiri dịka akụkụ nke otu ihe nkiri nke ndị agha Egypt Ọrụ ọganihu ya bịara mgbe ọ pụtara dịka onye ọrụ gọọmentị rụrụ arụ na ihe ngosi TV a ma ama 'My Dear Children, Thank You'. Mgbe ahụ, ya na ndị ama ama Faten Hamama, Salah Zulfikar na Farid Shawqi rụkọtara ọrụ na ihe ngosi TV
A maara ya nke ọma maka ụdị egwuregwu ya, o mekwara onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri.
Ọ lụrụ Magda n'afọ 1995, ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị atọ na otu nwa nwoke
Otu n'ime ụmụ ya nwanyị nwụrụ site na lymphoma.
Na 2018 Cairo International Film Festival, e nyere ya onyinye Faten Hamama iji kwado ihe ndị ọ rụzuru na ndụ ya na onyinye ya na ihe nkiri Egypt
N'ememe ahụ, Hosny kwuru na obi dị ya ụtọ ịnata onyinye ahụ mgbe ọ ka dị ndụ.
Ọ nwụrụ na Mee 30, 2020 n'ihi nkụchi obi mberede. E liri ya n'ebe ili ozu ezinụlọ ya na mpụga Cairo
Ihe ngosi ikpeazụ ya bụ na Sultana nke Al Moez nke gosipụtara n'oge Ramadan n'otu ọnwa ahụ.
